text: Satyrium mackwoodi, the Mackwood's hairstreak, is a small butterfly found in India that belongs to the lycaenids or blues family. ==See also== *List of butterflies of India *List of butterflies of India (Lycaenidae) ==References== * * * * * * mackwoodi Category:Butterflies of India Category:Endemic fauna of India Category:Taxa named by William Harry Evans
title: Satyrium mackwoodi
